title: x/mobile/example/audio compilation error on Linux
body:
When I try to compile the audio example app on my Linux desktop, I get the following error:
 ```
$ go build golang.org/x/mobile/example/audio
# golang.org/x/mobile/exp/audio/al
src/golang.org/x/mobile/exp/audio/al/al_notandroid.go:22:19: fatal error: AL/al.h: No such file or directory
 #include <AL/al.h>
                   ^
compilation terminated.
```
I tried removing the gomobile binary and reinstalling, but the issue remains.

go version: go1.5.2 linux/amd64
OS: Ubuntu 14.04 trusty (x86-64)
